snippet: A cousin of Ratko Mladic who hid the Bosnian Serb genocide suspect at his home until Mr. Mladic’s arrest last year was given a suspended prison sentence on Tuesday.
abstract: Branislav Mladic, a cousin of Bosnian Serb genocide suspect Ratko Mladic, is given a suspended prison sentence for hiding him in the village of Lazarevo for 5 of the 16 years he was able to evade arrest on war crimes charges.
lead_paragraph: A cousin of Ratko Mladic who hid the Bosnian Serb genocide suspect at his home until Mr. Mladic’s arrest last year was given a suspended prison sentence on Tuesday.

headline.seo: Cousin of Genocide Suspect Ratko Mladic Is Sentenced
headline.main: Serbia: Cousin of Genocide Suspect Draws Sentence for Harboring Him
headline.print_headline: Serbia: Cousin of Genocide Suspect Draws Sentence for Harboring Him

keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
keywords.name: subject
